name: Tameness conjecture
rephrased: A complete hyperbolic 3-manifold with a finitely generated fundamental group can be made compact by adding a boundary (it is topologically tame).
implication_form: If a complete hyperbolic 3-manifold has a finitely generated fundamental group, then it is topologically tame (i.e., homeomorphic to the interior of a compact 3-manifold).
solved_by: Ian Agol and Danny Calegari (and David Gabai)
